metadata.description: The destination IP address range in CIDR notation that this Policy checks for within the UDR. Example: 0.0.0.0/0 to check for the presence of a default route.
The next hope type that the policy checks for within the inspected route. The value can be Virtual Network, Virtual Network Gateway, Internet, Virtual Appliance, or None.
The IP address packets should be forwarded to.
Modify, Deny, Audit or Disabled the execution of the Policy
